name: ShaderMask
info: Can accommodate a child and apply shading to the child through a shader, with the ability to specify blending modes. Commonly used for gradient processing of components.

nodes.name: Radial Gradient Shading
desc: Create a radial gradient shader through RadialGradient#createShader.

nodes.name: Linear Gradient Shading
desc: Create a linear gradient shader through LinearGradient#createShader
For more information on shaders, see 【Drawing Album】
